page.title: 16VICTORIA PARK HACKNEY (CONT)
page.content: except this one has a space ship. A main road splits the park in two. In one half there are football pitches and a cricket pitch.There is an open air swimming pool used in the summer and a running track complete with hurdles, plus an old adventure play- ground. About two monthe ago they made a modern adventure with a death slide which is a long rope from high up,and you slide down on a rope. In the park is a band stand that nobody uses and a bowling ground. Victoria park is really known as Vicky park and is very well used by the local people especially in fine weather.It is really good to have a big area of open space in such a heavily built up part of London.
